org.dataconservancy.model.builder.xstream

Class AbstractEntityConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.model.builder.xstream.AbstractEntityConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter, com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConverterMatcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvailableDisciplineConverter

    public abstract class AbstractEntityConverter
extends Object
implements com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter
    Abstract XStream converter for the DCS object model. Encapsulates common logic for XStream converters such as nullity checks, XML namespace declarations, and QName handling. All Data Conservancy converters are expected to extend this class.

      • getElementName

        protected String getElementName(com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.HierarchicalStreamReader reader)
        Returns the current element name.

        If reader implements NsAwareStream, NsAwareStream.getQname() is called, and the local part of the QName is returned. Otherwise, HierarchicalStreamReader.getNodeName() is returned.

        Parameters:
        reader - the reader instance
        Returns:
        the current element name
        See Also:
        NsAwareStream.getQname(), HierarchicalStreamReader.getNodeName()
